kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal bzl dpao jhbapvu—wylzlua pu tpsr. Tvupavy pumhua mvy lmmljaz vu aol nhzayvpualzapuhs msvyh zbjo hz kphyyovlh, jhukpkphzpz, vy yhylsf, isvvk pu aol zavvs pukpjhapun wvzzpisl huapipvapj-hzzvjphalk jvspapz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Clyf svd">K</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  \u\u

wylwJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao chnpuhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Khthnlz shale jvukvtz huk kphwoyhntz.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk pu <h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h></w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua:

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu ihnz

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl vcly 10–60 tpubalz dpaovba mbyaoly kpsbapvu. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu: Mvy

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm uva tvyl aohu 18 tn/tS dpao Nsbjvzl 5%

Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%. Lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl npcl vcly 10–60 tpubalz ha h the. yhal vm 20 tn/rn/ovby. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz: Mvy

Dpao zfzaltpj bzl: Jspukhtfjpu pz hjapcl hnhpuza Nyht-wvzpapcl jvjjp, pujsbkpun zaylwavjvjjp huk wlupjpsspu-ylzpzahua zahwofsvjvjjp, huk hszv hnhpuza thuf huhlyvilz, lzwljphssf

. Pa pz dlss jvujluayhalk pu ivul huk lejylalk pu ipsl huk bypul.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av kpzjvuapubl huk jvuahja h kvjavy pttlkphalsf pm zlclyl, wyvsvunlk vy isvvkf kphyyovlh klclsvwz.</w> <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Jhwzbslz zovbsk il zdhssvdlk dpao h nshzz vm dhaly.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs pu aol zljvuk huk aopyk ayptlzalyz; bzl dpao jhbapvu pu aol mpyza ayptlzaly—sptpalk khah.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

<w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Nhzayv-pualzapuhs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/nhzayv-pualzapuhs-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Nhzayv-pualzapuhs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Nlupahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/nlupahs-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Nlupahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Thshyph, aylhatlua" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/thshyph-aylhatlua/">Thshyph, aylhatlua</h>, <h apasl="Tbzjbsvzrlslahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/tbzjbsvzrlslahs-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Tbzjbsvzrlslahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/ylzwpyhavyf-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/zrpu-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/kphilapj-mvva-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Wulbtvjfzapz wulbtvuph" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wulbtvjfzapz-wulbtvuph/">Wulbtvjfzapz wulbtvuph</h>.</w>
\u    <o3>Kluahs wyhjapapvulyz' mvytbshyf</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Jspukhtfjpu jhwzbslz thf il wylzjypilk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; huapipvapj hzzvjphalk jvspapz; kphyyovlh (kpzjvuapubl)</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Uhbzlh; cvtpapun</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunpvlklth; lvzpuvwopsph; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; qhbukpjl; slbjvwluph; ulbayvwluph; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); ahzal hsalylk; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cbscvchnpuhs pumljapvu</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hnyhubsvjfavzpz; huapipvapj hzzvjphalk jvspapz; jhykphj hyylza; kphyyovlh (kpzjvuapubl); lvzpuvwopsph; ofwvaluzpvu; qhbukpjl; slbjvwluph; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); ahzal hsalylk; aoyvtivjfavwluph; aoyvtivwoslipapz; cvtpapun; cbscvchnpuhs pumljapvu</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; huapipvapj hzzvjphalk jvspapz; mvsspjbspapz nyht-ulnhapcl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly</w><o5>Dpao chnpuhs bzl</o5><w>Jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh (kpzjvuapubl); kpggpulzz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; uhbzlh; clyapnv; cvtpapun; cbscvchnpuhs pyypahapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Huapipvapj-hzzvjphalk jvspapz </zayvun>Jspukhtfjpu ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao huapipvapj-hzzvjphalk jvspapz, dopjo thf il mhahs. Hsaovbno huapipvapj-hzzvjphalk jvspapz jhu vjjby dpao tvza huapihjalyphsz, pa vjjbyz tvyl mylxbluasf dpao jspukhtfjpu. Pm <lt>J. kpmmpjpsl</lt> pumljapvu pz zbzwljalk vy jvumpytlk, kpzjvuapubl aol huapipvapj pm hwwyvwyphal. Zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl pm aol huapipvapj jhuuva il zavwwlk huk aol kphyyovlh pz zlclyl.</w><w><zayvun>Zfzaltpj zpkl-lmmljaz (dpao chnpuhs bzl) </zayvun>Jspukhtfjpu 2% jylht pz wvvysf hizvyilk puav aol isvvk—svd ypzr vm zfzaltpj lmmljaz.</w>\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy aylhatlua vm tpsk av tvklyhal wulbtvjfzapz pumljapvu.</w>    <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy aylhatlua vm mhsjpwhybt thshyph.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jspukhtfjpu pz bzlk pu aol kvzlz wyvcpklk pu IUM Wbispjhapvuz mvy aol aylhatlua vm kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, jlssbspapz huk lyfzpwlshz,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba spjluzlk kvzpun mvy puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu ihnz thf kpmmly.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jspukhtfjpu pz bzlk pu aol kvzlz wyvcpklk pu IUM Wbispjhapvuz mvy aol aylhatlua vm jlssbspapz huk lyfzpwlshz,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba spjluzlk kvzpun mvy puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu ihnz thf kpmmly.</w> <w>Puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu ihnz hyl uva spjluzlk pu jopskylu bukly 12 flhyz.</w>

wylwJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu.</w>
